languages.text: {n}Голос мужчины падает до шепота.{/n} "А ишо молимся, чтобы взгляд ейный от нас подальше был. Страшные вещи говорят про столицу, про свиту ее, про людей пропавших. Дескать, во дворце ейном вечный бал дают, что ни на мгновение не кончается. Кто во дворец заходит из слуг — пропадает. Много, видать, работы на том балу".

{n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос мужчины падает до шепота.{/n} "А ишо молимся, чтобы взгляд ейный от нас подальше был. Страшные вещи говорят про столицу, про свиту ее, про людей пропавших. Дескать, во дворце ейном вечный бал дают, что ни на мгновение не кончается. Кто во дворец заходит из слуг — пропадает. Много, видать, работы на том балу".

traits.locale_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. They say the governor hosts a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who goes inside the palace never comes out. They must have an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人压低了声音。{/n}“我们还会祈祷，希望她永远都别盯上我们。大家都说了很多可怕的事情和传言，关于首都，关于她的宫廷，还有关于那些失踪的人。有传言说，那些人在她的宫殿里举办永无休止的舞会。舞会一刻都不会停歇，所有走进宫殿的仆人都再也没出来过。他们的舞会肯定有很多工作要做吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人压低了声音。{/n}“我们还会祈祷，希望她永远都别盯上我们。大家都说了很多可怕的事情和传言，关于首都，关于她的宫廷，还有关于那些失踪的人。有传言说，那些人在她的宫殿里举办永无休止的舞会。舞会一刻都不会停歇，所有走进宫殿的仆人都再也没出来过。他们的舞会肯定有很多工作要做吧。”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}彼の声が囁くように、小さくなる。{/n}「私たちも、彼女が狙いを定めないよう祈りましょう。首都については様々な恐ろしい噂があります。裁判所や、行方不明者。噂によると、彼女の宮殿では終わりのない舞踏会が催されていて、踊りが終わることはないとか。そして、宮殿に足を踏み入れた召使は二度と出てこない。舞踏会ではものすごい量の仕事があるに違いません」
languages.original_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の声が囁くように、小さくなる。{/n}「私たちも、彼女が狙いを定めないよう祈りましょう。首都については様々な恐ろしい噂があります。裁判所や、行方不明者。噂によると、彼女の宮殿では終わりのない舞踏会が催されていて、踊りが終わることはないとか。そして、宮殿に足を踏み入れた召使は二度と出てこない。舞踏会ではものすごい量の仕事があるに違いません」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «También rezamos para que no se fije en nosotros. Corren rumores terribles sobre la capital, sobre su corte y sobre la gente desaparecida. Dicen que en su palacio hay un baile eterno que no se detiene ni un instante, y que cualquier sirviente que entre no vuelve a salir. Deben de tener mucho trabajo en ese baile».
languages.original_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «También rezamos para que no se fije en nosotros. Corren rumores terribles sobre la capital, sobre su corte y sobre la gente desaparecida. Dicen que en su palacio hay un baile eterno que no se detiene ni un instante, y que cualquier sirviente que entre no vuelve a salir. Deben de tener mucho trabajo en ese baile».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern.{/n} "Und wir beten, dass sie uns nie erblickt. Man erzählt sich gruselige Dinge über die Hauptstadt, über ihren Hof, über die Verschwundenen. Angeblich findet in ihrem Palast ein endloser Ball statt. Der Tanz hört nie auf, nicht einen Augenblick lang. Wenn ein Diener den Palast betritt, kommt er nie wieder heraus. Muss reichlich Arbeit für Diener geben bei diesem komischen Ball."
languages.original_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern.{/n} "Und wir beten, dass sie uns nie erblickt. Man erzählt sich gruselige Dinge über die Hauptstadt, über ihren Hof, über die Verschwundenen. Angeblich findet in ihrem Palast ein endloser Ball statt. Der Tanz hört nie auf, nicht einen Augenblick lang. Wenn ein Diener den Palast betritt, kommt er nie wieder heraus. Muss reichlich Arbeit für Diener geben bei diesem komischen Ball."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Il continue en murmurant :{/n} « On prie aussi pour qu'elle s'intéresse pas trop à nous. Y a des bruits effrayants qui courent concernant la capitale, la cour de la gouverneure et des disparitions inexpliquées. Paraît même qu'elle organise un bal sans fin dans son palais. On raconte que tout le monde est obligé de danser pour l'éternité, sans jamais pouvoir s'arrêter. En tout cas, tous les serviteurs qui ont mis les pieds dans son palais n'en sont jamais ressortis. Après, ça doit être un sacré boulot de servir à ce bal. »
languages.original_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il continue en murmurant :{/n} « On prie aussi pour qu'elle s'intéresse pas trop à nous. Y a des bruits effrayants qui courent concernant la capitale, la cour de la gouverneure et des disparitions inexpliquées. Paraît même qu'elle organise un bal sans fin dans son palais. On raconte que tout le monde est obligé de danser pour l'éternité, sans jamais pouvoir s'arrêter. En tout cas, tous les serviteurs qui ont mis les pieds dans son palais n'en sont jamais ressortis. Après, ça doit être un sacré boulot de servir à ce bal. »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Bir yandan da bizi bir daha gözüne kestirmesin diye dua ediyoruz. Başkent hakkında, divanı hakkında, kaybolan kimseler hakkında pek hayırlı şeyler duymuyoruz. Söylenen o ki sarayında sonsuz balolar düzenleniyormuş. Bir anlığına bile dans etmeyi bırakmıyorlarmış. Saraya adım atan hizmetkârdan bir daha haber alınmıyormuş. Baloyla ne kadar meşgul oluyorlarsa artık... "
languages.original_text: {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "We also pray that she never sets her sights on us. They say scary things about the capital, about her court, about the missing people. Rumour has it, they host a never-ending ball at her palace. The dancing never stops, not for a moment. Any servant who steps inside the palace never comes out. There must be an awful lot of work to do at that ball of theirs."
